hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Qatada with the same chain of transmitters (but with a change of these words):" He is more entitled to get it than any other creditor

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَدْرَكَ مَا بَاعَهُ عِنْدَ الْمُشْتَرِي وَقَدْ أَفْلَسَ فَلَهُ الرُّجُوعُ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: If a man finds what he sold with the purchaser, who has become bankrupt, then he has the right to take it back
